txt.en: After the collapse of Barad-dûr, a torrent of debris has scattered all over eastern Dor Amarth. Those who survived the Mordor-host have built camps among these ruins and rubble. You should destroy their encampments before the Orc numbers begin to organize.
Scattered all over eastern Dor Amarth, survivors of the Mordor-host have built camps among the ruins of Barad-dûr.
Destroy Orc tents in Dor Amarth ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
You have destroyed many Orc tents in Dor Amarth on your conquests through Gorgoroth.
Destroyed many Orc tents in Dor Amarth.
Orcs encampments can be found around Dor Amarth.\n\nYou should destroy any Orc tents that you find.
